com.example.aishuatiserver.mapper

接口 NewsMapper


  • @Mapper
public interface NewsMapper

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void readNews(int senderId, int receiverId, java.util.Date date) 
      void sendNews(java.util.List<News> list) 
      java.util.List<News> showMyAllNews(int stuId, int offset, int size) 
      int showMyAllNewsCount(int stuId) 
      java.util.List<News> showMyNews(int stuId, int offset, int size) 
      int showMyNewsCount(int stuId) 

    • 方法详细资料

      • sendNews

        @Insert(value="<script> insert into news values\n  <foreach collection= \'list\' item= \'item\'  separator=\',\'>\n(#{item.sander_Id},#{item.receiver_Id},#{item.content},#{item.createTime},#{item.state})\n</foreach> \n</script>")
void sendNews(@Param(value="list")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     java.util.List<News> list)

      • readNews

        @Update(value="update news set state = 1 where sander_Id = #{senderId},receiver_Id = #{receiverId},createTime = #{date}")
void readNews(int senderId,
                                                                                                                                         int receiverId,
                                                                                                                                         java.util.Date date)

      • showMyNews

        @Select(value="select sander_Id,receiver_Id,content,createTime,state from news where receiver_Id = #{stuId} and state = 0 order by createTime limit #{offset},#{size}")
java.util.List<News> showMyNews(int stuId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                         int offset,
                                                                                                                                                                                                         int size)

      • showMyAllNews

        @Select(value="select sander_Id,receiver_Id,content,createTime,state from news where receiver_Id = #{stuId} order by createTime limit #{offset},#{size}")
java.util.List<News> showMyAllNews(int stuId,
                                                                                                                                                                                              int offset,
                                                                                                                                                                                              int size)

      • showMyNewsCount

        @Select(value="select count(*) from news where receiver_Id = #{stuId} and state = 0")
int showMyNewsCount(int stuId)

      • showMyAllNewsCount

        @Select(value="select count(*) from news where receiver_Id = #{stuId}")
int showMyAllNewsCount(int stuId)
